sentences.en: A flexible work life such as telecommuting, is good for your health, researchers said.
sentences.cn: 研究人员称,远程办公等弹性工作模式有益于身体健康.

sentences.en: Add to that, issues about Internet security and to that telecommuting doesn't work for everyone.
sentences.cn: 加上网路安全的问题仍旧存在,不难看出其实电子通勤并非适用于每个人.

sentences.en: Here are six tips for successful start in a telecommuting position.
sentences.cn: 下面是让远程办公有个良好开端的六大要诀.

sentences.en: How will it affect the telecommuting ( VPN ) community?
sentences.cn: 它会影响到虚拟专用网 ( VPN ) 吗 ?

sentences.en: Managers have discovered that telecommuting revitalizes their skills.
sentences.cn: 经理们发现远距离工作为他们的技术注入了新的活力.

sentences.en: More people are telecommuting. More people are working as freelancers or consultants.
sentences.cn: 更多的人开始远程办公, 更多的人开始成为自由职业者或者顾问.

sentences.en: Some jobs are better suited to telecommuting than others.
sentences.cn: 有些工作比其他工作更适合远程办公.

sentences.en: Successful telecommuting provides flexibility and benefits to eng employee and to the firm.
sentences.cn: 成功的远程办公为员工和公司带来灵活性和益处.

sentences.en: Telecommuting raises a challenge to the old style of working in office.
sentences.cn: 在家工作对传统的办公室工作提出了挑战.

sentences.en: Telecommuting, however, is not without its problems.
sentences.cn: 但是, 电讯家庭办公并非就是十全十美.

sentences.en: Telecommuting: Working at home and communicating with office by means of computers.
sentences.cn: 电传作业: 用电脑联系办公室,在家里工作的情况.

sentences.en: There is also the potential to develop telecommuting and other more flexible working practices.
sentences.cn: 也有发展家庭远程办公及其他更灵活的工作方式的可能性。

sentences.en: This way of working is called telecommuting or teleworking.
sentences.cn: 这种工作方式称之为远程办公或远程工作.

sentences.en: To search for a telecommuting job online efficiently and effectively choose the right keywords.
sentences.cn: 要想有效而迅速地找到一份在线远程工作要选对关键词.

sentences.en: When looking for a telecommuting job online, use the right keywords.
sentences.cn: 当你在网上寻找远程工作时, 要使用正确的关键词.

words.tran_cn: 电话会议；[通信] 远程会议

trans.tran_cn: 远程联机,  远程办公
trans.tran_en: Telecommuting is working from home using equipment such as telephones, fax machines, and modems to contact people

trans.tran_cn: 电讯家庭办公/在家办公，远程交换，远程办公
